Events

Last update on 5 Feb 2025

Posted on April 11, 2023

Here is a quick list of events in the next year or so that I found interesting. This list reflects my personal preferences, but I think it might be useful to others.

Other places to find events:

  • Institute for Mathematical Statistics
  • Applied Probability Trust
  • Women in Mathematics
  • Carl Muller Webpage

Last updated: 05/02/2025

2025

17-28 February

  • Winter school on Statistical Mechanics, Nonequilibrium Processes and Probability
    • University of Rome La Sapienza

24-28 March

  • Oxford Probability Workshop: Random Discrete Structures
    • Oxford University

31 May - 4 April

  • UK Easter Probability Meeting
    • Durham University

5 May - 15 August

  • Trimester Program: Probabilistic methods in quantum field theory
    • Hausdorff Research Institute (Bonn)

2 - 27 June

  • PIMS-CRM Summer School in Probability
    • PIMS

30 June - 4 July

  • Random Geometric Structures and Statistical Physics
    • Part of the thematic program: Statistical Mechanics and Non Equilibrium Processes

30 June - 12 July

  • Saint-Flour Summer School
    • Laboratoire de Mathématiques Blaise Pascal

7 July

  • P@W Summer School - Recent Trends in Probability and Statistics
    • University of Warwick

14 - 18 July

  • Stochastic Processes and their Applications
    • University of Wrocław and Wrocław University of Science and Technology

2026

4 - 22 May

  • Statistical Mechanics and Singular SPDEs
    • National University of Singapore
